about_the_game:
Deep in her lair slumbers an avatar of the goddess Snek, guardian of her secret and mysterious temple. When raiders and grave-robbers come seeking ancient treasure, the stern priestesses sound the alarm and Snek awakens to defend the temple, monch the infidels, and grow and grow and grow...

Play as a giant snake in an intercoiled tile-based puzzle dungeon. Explore, master puzzle mechanics and special abilities, and uncover secrets... all is not what it seems in the Temple of Snek.

This is a 20-30 minute demo showcasing the basic mechanics and parts of the dungeon and palace areas.
detailed_description:
Deep in her lair slumbers an avatar of the goddess Snek, guardian of her secret and mysterious temple. When raiders and grave-robbers come seeking ancient treasure, the stern priestesses sound the alarm and Snek awakens to defend the temple, monch the infidels, and grow and grow and grow...

Play as a giant snake in an intercoiled tile-based puzzle dungeon. Explore, master puzzle mechanics and special abilities, and uncover secrets... all is not what it seems in the Temple of Snek.

This is a 20-30 minute demo showcasing the basic mechanics and parts of the dungeon and palace areas.
name: Temple Of Snek Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core processor, 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core processor, 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The official demo for TEMPLE OF SNEK: a snaky tile-based puzzle dungeon adventure. Defend the temple, monch the infidels, and grow and grow and grow...
